solution_line_template: Twice what Orlando gained is {twice_multiplier}*{orlando_gain}=<<{twice_multiplier}*{orlando_gain}={twice_orlando_gain}>>{twice_orlando_gain} pounds.

Jose gained {jose_additional_gain} pounds more than twice what Orlando gained for a total of {jose_additional_gain}+{twice_orlando_gain}=<<{jose_additional_gain}+{twice_orlando_gain}={jose_gain}>>{jose_gain} pounds..
Half of what Jose gained is {jose_gain}/{half_divisor}=<<{jose_gain}/{half_divisor}={half_jose_gain}>>{half_jose_gain} pounds.

Fernando gained {fernando_less_gain} pounds less than half of what Jose gained, for a total of {half_jose_gain}-{fernando_less_gain}=<<{half_jose_gain}-{fernando_less_gain}={fernando_gain}>>{fernando_gain} pounds.
In total, the three family members gained {orlando_gain}+{jose_gain}+{fernando_gain}=<<{orlando_gain}+{jose_gain}+{fernando_gain}={total_gain}>>{total_gain} pounds at the reunion.
